text: Milan Lazarević (; born 10 January 1997) is a Serbian footballer who plays as a defender for Rad. ==Career== Coming from Milići where he started playing football, Lazarević played for RFK Novi Sad before he joined Vojvodina youth ranks. At the beginning of 2016, Lazarević moved in Serbian First League club Proleter, where he stayed until the end of 2015–16 season scoring 1 goal on 10 appearances. In summer 2016, he returned to Vojvodina, but also continued training with Proleter.
